column1: Specifications: "Enterprise-grade access hub with entry and exit control up to eight doors and battery backup support."
(8+8) Inputs for request-to-exit devices and door position sensors
"LEDs": "System: white/blue\nOutput relays: steady white\nEthernet: flashing white"
"Digital input": "(8) Inputs for request-to-exit devices\n(8) Inputs for door position sensors\n(1) Emergency"
"Dry output relay": "(8) Lock terminals (12V or Dry)\n(4) AUX terminals for advanced setup (Chime/Siren/Door opener)"

column2:
device is ready
Steady white: pending adoption
Blinking white/blue: upgrading firmware
Breathing white: system initiating"
